query.statement:
SELECT MM013.CHAR1 AS CHAR1 , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.CHDAT) AS CHDAT , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.CHTIM) AS CHTIM , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.DDATE) AS DDATE , MM013.DNAME AS DNAME , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.DTIME) AS DTIME , MM013.EBELN AS EBELN , MM013.EBELP AS EBELP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EDATE) AS EDATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT , MM013.EKGRP AS EKGRP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.ETIME) AS ETIME , MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM013.GROES AS GROES , MM013.INFNR AS INFNR , MM013.KNTTP AS KNTTP , MM013.LGOBE AS LGOBE , MM013.LGORT AS LGORT , MM013.LIFNR AS LIFNR , MM013.LNAME AS LNAME , MM013.MANDT AS MANDT , MM013.MATNR AS MATNR , VALUE(MM011.BISMT,'') AS BISMT , MM013.MEINS AS MEINS , MM013.MENGE AS MENGE , (MM013.MENGE - VALUE(MM017A.MENGE, 0)) AS MENGE1 , VALUE(MM017A.B_MENGE, 0) AS B_MENGE , MM013.NAME1 AS NAME1 , SAPHEE.GET_CURRDATA(MM013.WAERS,MM013.NETPR) AS NETPR , MM013.POSID AS POSID , MM013.POST1 AS POST1 , MM013.POTYPE AS POTYPE , MM013.PSTYP AS PSTYP , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE , MM013.SNAME AS SNAME , MM013.STATE AS STATE , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.STIME) AS STIME , MM013.SUBMI AS SUBMI , (MM011.MATNR_NM ||','|| MM011.ZSIZE ||','|| MM011.SPEC) AS TXZ01 , SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE , MM013.VALUE AS VALUE , MM013.WAERS AS WAERS , MM013.WERKS AS WERKS , MM013.ZEINR AS ZEINR , '0' AS CHECK , SAPHEE.GET_VENDER_NAME(MM013.MANDT, MM013.LIFNR) AS RV_NAME , (SELECT CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = '10' AND CODE2 = MM013.EKGRP) AS R_EKGRP ,SAPHEE.GET_REMARK(MM013.MANDT, SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9),MM013.MATNR,' | ',270) AS TEX01 , CASE WHEN SAPHEE.GET_JAJEA_BALJU(MM013.MANDT, MM013.POSID,MM013.MATNR) < 0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS BIGO --,'0' AS BIGO , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_PROJ_END(MM013.MANDT,MM013.POSID ),'') AS P_END , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_SEOLCHI_VEND_NAME(MM013.MANDT,MM013.POSID ),'') AS S_VEND FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT MANDT , EBELN , EBELP ,COALESCE(SUM(MM017.MENGE - MM017.B_MENGE),0) AS MENGE ,COALESCE(SUM(MM017.B_MENGE),0) AS B_MENGE FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT017 AS MM017 WHERE MM017.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM017.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND MM017.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE_FM# AND #UDATE_TO#
AND MM017.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE_FM# AND #UDATE_TO#
AND MM017.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM017.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM017.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM017.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM017.MATNR = #MATNR#
AND MM017.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM017.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
AND MM017.PRO_F >= '1' AND MM017.POTYPE = 'X' GROUP BY MM017.MANDT,MM017.EBELN,MM017.EBELP) AS MM017A ON MM013.MANDT = MM017A.MANDT AND MM013.EBELN = MM017A.EBELN AND MM013.EBELP = MM017A.EBELP WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #UDATE_FM# AND #UDATE_TO#
AND MM013.SDATE BETWEEN #UDATE_FM# AND #UDATE_TO#
AND MM013.STATE = '2'
AND MM013.WERKS = #WERKS#
AND MM013.LGORT = #LGORT#
AND MM013.EKGRP = #EKGRP#
AND MM013.POSID BETWEEN #POSID1# AND #POSID2#
AND MM013.MATNR = #MATNR#
AND MM013.EBELN = #EBELN#
AND MM013.EXTWG LIKE '%'||#EXTWG#||'%'
AND MM013.POTYPE = 'X'
ORDER BY EBELN,EBELP,UDATE,POSID FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
